user1.title: Twilio integration
user1.body: Create new note via SMS. Support text, audio, links, and media.

user1.title: Audio recording in note
user1.body: Show audio in a note and playback UI

user1.title: Bookmark in note
user1.body: Show rich link UI in a note, and feature to render website screenshot.

user1.title: Mobile view
user1.body: Functions for both web responsive and native apps. Note: Android and iOS will need unique share icons.
